refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Load a SciDB plugin. The act of loading a plugin shared library first registers the library in the SciDB system catalogs. Then it opens and examines the shared library to store its contents with SciDB's internal extension management subsystem. Shared library module which are registered with the SciDB instance will be loaded at system start time.
To unload a library, see the unload_library operator reference.
